name: @martin_hotell/ts-lint-config
description: tslint config for sane TypeScript developer ðŸ’ª
author: Martin Hochel <hochelmartin@gmail.com>

scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 1
scripts.size: npm run size:umd && npm run size:fesm
scripts.size:umd: shx echo "Gzipped+minified UMD bundle Size:" && cross-var strip-json-comments --no-whitespace "./dist/bundles/index.umd.min.js" | gzip-size
scripts.size:fesm: shx echo "Gzipped+minified FESM bundle Size:" && strip-json-comments --no-whitespace "./dist/bundles/index.esm.min.js" | gzip-size
